formulas.name: DocumentAttached
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!CaseRecord.Category_3__c})= "Other" && TEXT({!CaseRecord.Category_2__c}) = {!$Label.Destruction_Requests}, {!$Label.Approval_Attached},
IF(TEXT({!CaseRecord.Category_2__c}) = {!$Label.Disposal}, {!$Label.Disposal_Form_Attached},
IF(TEXT({!CaseRecord.Category_2__c}) = {!$Label.Repack_Requests}, {!$Label.VAP_Form_Attached},
CASE(TEXT({!CaseRecord.Category_3__c}), "PAB Form - Attached", {!$Label.PAB_Attached}, "VAP", {!$Label.VAP_Form_Attached}, "Expiration", {!$Label.Approval_Attached}, "Obsolete", {!$Label.Approval_Attached}, "Inventory Adjustment", {!$Label.Approval_Attached}, "Cost Center / IO Reclassification", {!$Label.Manual_JE_form_Attached}, "G/L Account Reclassification", {!$Label.Manual_JE_form_Attached}, "Accrual", {!$Label.Manual_JE_form_Attached}, "Upload", {!$Label.Upload_Form_Attached}, "Intercompany", {!$Label.Manual_JE_form_Attached}, "3rd Party", {!$Label.Manual_JE_form_Attached}, {!$Label.Documents_Attached} ) ) ) )

{!GBS_Error}
{!RequiredFields}
